Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-5991 affecting package mariadb for versions less than 10.6.9-6
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-5991 affecting package mariadb for versions less than 10.6.9-6. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package mariadb is earlier than 10.6.9-6, affected by CVE-2024-5991
